title: AI-Generated Content Disclosure
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: ai-generated-content-disclosure-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: AI-0421
	- preferred-term:: AI-Generated Content Disclosure
	- source-domain:: ai
	- owl:class:: ai:AIGeneratedContentDisclosure
	- status:: complete
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Mandatory transparency requirement specifying that content created wholly or partially by AI systems must be explicitly labeled with origin metadata for user awareness and regulatory compliance.
	- source:: [[EU AI Act]], [[IEEE 7001]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: ai-generated-content-disclosure-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-part-of:: [[AI Transparency Framework]]
		- has-part:: [[AI Origin Declaration]]
		- has-part:: [[Disclosure Enforcement Mechanism]]
		- has-part:: [[Content Labeling Metadata]]
		- has-part:: [[Transparency Notice]]
		- requires:: [[Metadata Standards]]
		- requires:: [[Provenance Tracking]]
		- requires:: [[Content Authentication]]
		- enables:: [[Trust Building]]
		- enables:: [[Regulatory Compliance]]
		- enables:: [[Informed Consent]]
		- enables:: [[User Awareness]]
		- depends-on:: [[C2PA Standard]]
		- depends-on:: [[IEEE 7001]]
		- depends-on:: [[EU AI Act]]

## Metadata

- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16
- **Review Status**: Automated remediation with 2025 context
- **Verification**: Academic sources verified
- **Regional Context**: UK/North England where applicable
